body: @Frozzy, does anybody really get,"turned gay"? I'm Bi, and proud of it! There's so much to do with both sexes! Why limit yourself?! Anyway, I loved this!

katou jun, abgrund, nemunemu, shimaji, and okabayashi beru are pretty much the first aritsts that turned me gay. Sadly abgrund doesnt do anymore yaoi or shimaji now from the looks of it. atleast there are new artists coming forth these days.
Today is such a good day!
Chinzurena and Takase yuu are my favorites. x3

Oh wow Volume 12 is out, I regret spending 9 dollars in DLsite for this fuck it 6 out of 10, I can't vibe with any of this other than Mogiki Hayami's part, and what the fuck is wrong with Shiroo and his unfinished sketches would've been better if he finsihed it and so it would look like his output in Volume 9.
hooly shit, the one with the dark skin trap demon has me leaking a bunch of precum and I ain't even started
